name: Peak Lapel Tuxedo
desc: This is peak formalwear style, literally. It's tough to beat the classic yet statement-making look of a peak lapel tuxedo plus, the upward-pointing lapels frame your face and elongate your frame. Win, win. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Notch Lapel Tuxedo
desc: This is it: the notch lapel tuxedo you've been looking for. A modern take on the iconic tux, it looks great paired with a classic black bow tie or worn with something more unique. Do you. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Shawl Collar Tuxedo
desc: Shawls aren't just for little old ladies. This shawl collar tux feels both fresh and classic perfect for when you want to stand out a little. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Midnight Pin Dot Tuxedo
desc: Crafted with a subtle pin dot pattern and black satin shawl collar, this dinner jacket pokes holes in the dated idea that formalwear requires restraint. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Charcoal Suit
desc: Probably our most versatile look, this charcoal suit can be dressed up or down depending on your style and event. Some might call it the chameleon of formalwear. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Light Grey Suit
desc: Like a cloud passing in front of the afternoon sun, this light grey suit provides the perfect shade to get you through any event in style. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Grey Suit
desc: Abraham Lincoln said that you can't please all of the people all of the time, but he wasn't talking to a grey suit. You can wear medium grey year round. It's simultaneously classic and modern, effortless and refined. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Tan Suit
desc: Lighten up in the perfect tan suit. Great for warm weather events, it's as serious or laidback as the accessories you pair it with. This exclusive style was designed by Ovadia & Sons for The Black Tux. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Light Blue Shawl Tuxedo
desc: Take it all in with a look that makes an appearance once in a light blue moon. A shawl collar in a distinctive blue effortlessly becomes a style to behold. Includes a matching light blue jacket and pants.

name: Onyx Dot Peak Lapel Tuxedo
desc: All ears are on you with a look that has stories to tell. Peak satin lapels add a layer of intrigue to black wool that runs deep in alluring white dots. Includes a matching dotted dinner jacket and pants.

name: Burgundy Shawl Jacket Tuxedo
desc: Feel all the feels in a look that doesn't hesitate to let it glow. The rich red tones of this shawl jacket hold all the power to light up the room. Includes a burgundy dinner jacket and classic black tuxedo pants.

name: Tropical Velvet Tuxedo
desc: Venture into the deep tropics with a look that's ready to explore. This velvet shawl jacket’s tropical pattern doesn’t wait for summer to create a striking contrast against a white tuxedo shirt. Includes a tropical velvet dinner jacket with black satin lapels and classic black tuxedo pants.

name: Ocean Velvet Tuxedo
desc: Make a splash with a look that makes an entrance. Luxe velvet takes on a deep sea blue color for a vibe that’s both refined and cool. Includes an ocean velvet dinner jacket and classic black tuxedo pants.

name: White Dinner Jacket Tuxedo
desc: The white dinner jacket is an iconic look. Originally a warm weather alternative to the standard black tux, these days a white jacket tux keeps its cool in any climate. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Black Watch Tartan Tuxedo
desc: This tartan tux features the traditional Black Watch pattern, adding subdued interest in low light. Made of wool with black satin peak lapels. Delivered with Black Watch tartan tuxedo pants for a bold look. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Rose Shawl Jacket Tuxedo
desc: Inspired by the final moments of light in the mountains of Southern California, this dinner jacket's charismatic rose hue harnesses the good vibes from sunset to sunrise. Delivered with black tuxedo pants for a timeless look. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Emerald Shawl Tuxedo
desc: This tux is a double-take magnet. The rich jewel tones of our emerald shawl tuxedo make for a party-perfect look you can't help but admire. Includes matching emerald jacket and pants.

name: Ruby Velvet Jacket Tuxedo
desc: We're really feeling the rich jewel tones of this lightweight velvet shawl jacket. Its unmistakable ruby color and texture guarantee you'll stand out for the right reasons. Includes jacket and black tuxedo pants.

name: Chambray Tuxedo
desc: Woven from Italian wool, this tuxedo's light grey chambray body creates a mellow contrast with the smooth indigo satin shawl lapel. Delivered with matching chambray and satin tuxedo pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Silver Shawl Black Tuxedo
desc: This tux delivers rich detail on both the body and lapel, crafted with a textured pattern wool. Delivered with matching black and silver tuxedo pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Color Blocked Velvet Jacket Tuxedo
desc: Show your true colors - all of them - in this Color Blocked Velvet Jacket Tuxedo. Rich color palette, shawl collar with black satin lapels - could this tux be more ready to party? We think not. Includes a velvet dinner jacket and classic black tuxedo pants for a spotlight-ready look.

name: Cotton Dress Shirt
desc: It all starts with a crisp, white dress shirt. The perfect foundation piece, it can easily be dressed up or down depending on your event the possibilities are endless.

name: Cotton Fly-Front Dress Shirt
desc: Sometimes, you want to leave a little to the imagination. That's why we designed this understated fly-front dress shirt, with a semi-spread collar, and a concealed placket that covers your buttons.

name: Cotton Wing Tip Shirt
desc: The iconic tuxedo shirt essential for a complete black tie look. This crisp shirt has a classic wing tip collar (designed for a bow tie) and a pleated bib front (which is much classier than the kind babies wear).

name: Wing Collar Fly-Front Dress Shirt
desc: This iconic twist on the classic tux shirt ditches the bib front for a modern concealed placket, but maintains the formal wing tip collar you need to complete any black tie look.

name: Pleated Point Collar Shirt
desc: A modern take on the classic, this crisp tuxedo shirt has a fold-down collar, pleated bib, and concealed placket to hide your buttons.

name: White Ruffle Tuxedo Shirt
desc: This isn’t your father’s ruffled shirt. Both modern and nostalgic, this trim white tuxedo shirt gives new life to the ruffle bib and makes a bold statement.

name: Blue Dress Shirt
desc: Sometimes, having the blues is a good thing. This pale blue shirt will add a pop of unexpected color to your look, and is the perfect canvas for showing off your neckwear.

name: Black Dress Shirt
desc: Make a statement in this black cotton dress shirt-a modern twist on the classic, and the perfect foundation piece for showcasing your accessories. Going to the dark side has never looked better..

name: Blue Striped Shirt
desc: If you're playing pool, you're either stripes or solids. When it comes to your outfit, you don't need to choose sides. Match this timeless top with any tie and watch its subtle stripes accentuate your neckwear.

name: Pink Dress Shirt
desc: It's not all black or white. Sometimes it's pink and damn, does it look good. This crisp shirt will add a pop of unexpected color to your look, and is the perfect canvas for showing off your neckwear.

name: Blue Ruffle Tuxedo Shirt
desc: This isn’t your father’s ruffled shirt. Both modern and nostalgic, this trim blue tuxedo shirt gives new life to the ruffle bib and makes a bold statement.

name: Tie Clip
desc: Tie clips have looks and brains: they hold your tie in place, and they're like jewelry for your neckwear.

name: White Satin Cummerbund
desc: We designed this cummerbund to be worn with its sophisticated neckwear counterpart: our white satin bow tie. Coincidentally, it also makes a great place to store your phone.

name: Ivory Tuxedo Vest
desc: This ivory satin vest has you covered. From layered under a jacket, to boogie-ing without one on the dance floor, it's designed to make a statement.

name: Black Tuxedo Vest
desc: Designed to be worn with any of our black tuxedos, this vest has you covered - from layered under a jacket, to boogying without one on the dance floor.

name: Black Low Cut Tuxedo Vest
desc: Wear this vest, and you're doing it right. The low cut creates a tapered (i.e. slimming) silhouette, and shows off more of your shirt. Win, win.

name: Navy Suit Vest
desc: Designed to be worn with our navy suit, this vest has you covered - from layered under a jacket, to boogying without one on the dance floor.

name: Charcoal Suit Vest
desc: Designed to be worn with our charcoal suit, this vest has you covered - from layered under a jacket, to boogying without one on the dance floor.

name: Midnight Blue Tuxedo
desc: Midnight blue is no fad: it's been around since the invention of electric light (which caused the blue wool to appear blacker than black). Today, it separates you from the pack, without breaking any formal dress codes. Includes jacket and pants. Pants are available in classic and slim fits.

name: Tan Suit Vest
desc: Designed to be worn with our tan suit, this vest has you covered - from layered under a jacket, to boogying without one on the dance floor.

name: Light Grey Suit Vest
desc: Designed to be worn with our light grey suit, this vest has you covered - from layered under a jacket, to boogying without one on the dance floor.

name: Silver Onyx Cufflinks
desc: Don't mess with the classics. When it comes to formal dressing, these sleek onyx cufflinks always have been - and always will be - a style 'yes.'

name: Silver Onyx Button Studs
desc: Pull it together - your outfit, that is. These onyx button studs are the essential finishing touch for your black tie look. Wear them with our silver onyx cufflinks for a perfect match.

name: Gold Onyx Cufflinks
desc: You really can't go wrong with gold onyx cufflinks. Simple and timeless, they're the essential finishing touch for any formal look.

name: Gold Onyx Button Studs
desc: The gold standard for button studs. Made from polished brass and sleek onyx, they'll take any black tie look to the next level.

name: Silver Pearl Cufflinks
desc: These cufflinks are classic with a twist, just like you. The mother of pearl adds enough shine to make you stand out, while the simple shape couldn't be more timeless.

name: Silver Pearl Button Studs
desc: It's all in the details. Case in point: these timeless mother of pearl button studs, an essential finishing touch for your black tie look.

name: Gold Pearl Cufflinks
desc: Prepare for compliments these gold tone and mother of pearl cufflinks are guaranteed to make you shine at your event.

name: Gold Pearl Button Studs
desc: You don't have to go diving for these pearls. Our classic studs will add just enough shine to your look no scuba gear required.

name: Black and White Cufflinks
desc: Trouble making decisions? No problem these reversible cufflinks can be worn as black or white, depending on your mood (or outfit).

name: Silver Knot Cufflinks
desc: These are knot your average cufflinks. The double knot design adds just the right amount of personality to your look, while still keeping it in the 'timeless and classic' range.

name: Black Brass Knot Cufflinks
desc: These are knot your average cufflinks. The black brass and double knot design add just the right amount of personality to your look, while still keeping it in the 'timeless and classic' range.

name: Gold Knot Cufflinks
desc: Go for gold. If you're looking for a subtle way to add a little flash to your look, these cufflinks with a refined knot design are a clear winner.

name: Silver Plaque Cufflinks
desc: Simplicity can make a statement just check out these silver plaque cufflinks. Refined and versatile, they're guaranteed to kick any formal look up a notch.

name: Silver Dots Cufflinks
desc: Spotted: these polka dot cufflinks. Your go-to for giving your look a modern update.

name: Gold Texture Cufflinks
desc: We're really feeling these textured cufflinks. The simple design is classic and refined, while the gold tone will make you stand out a bit.

name: Black Butterfly Bow Tie
desc: Like Paul McCartney, Coca Cola or Oprah, this bow tie is an icon in its field. There's simply nothing more timeless, which is probably why it's one of our most popular styles.

name: Black Satin Diamond Bow Tie
desc: Shine bright with a black silk satin bow tie that completes your polished look. Hand-tied into a bold diamond shape, this bow tie perfectly complements satin lapels.

name: Black Satin Straight Bow Tie
desc: Polish off your classic look wearing a bow tie crafted from black silk satin. Hand-tied with attention to its elegant details, this bow tie makes a sophisticated statement at formal events.

name: Black Satin Necktie
desc: This slim (but not skinny) tie is like your best friend: a trusted sidekick. It's versatile, timeless and, unlike your real best friend, has never thrown up in your car.

name: Burgundy Wool/Silk Necktie
desc: A burgundy tie wine not? This one's the perfect width (slim, but not skinny), and will give you a pop of color while keeping you classic. Cheers to that.

name: Grey Cotton Necktie
desc: You can't do it all, unless you're a grey tie. With its light, neutral color, it works well indoors and outdoors, all year round.

name: Black Linen Necktie
desc: Our black linen tie is warm weather classic. This piece is handcrafted with the finest fabric to give your look an extra touch of sophistication.

name: Olive Silk Necktie
desc: This tie puts olive the others to shame. The deep green brings some color to your look, while the silk repp fabric kicks things up a notch.

name: Black Stripe Silk Necktie
desc: Our striped necktie is a classic staple for the well-dressed man. This piece is meticulously handcrafted with a fine silk repp weave to give you an extra touch of sophistication.

name: Lavender Silk Necktie
desc: Who doesn't love a good pastel? We know we do. Ideal for spring and summer, this lavender silk tie is perfect for bringing some seasonal color to your look.

name: Violet Silk Necktie
desc: Purple is the color of royalty, which makes sense because this silk tie rules. Wear it whenever you want to add some refined color to your look.

name: Cummerbund
desc: Highly traditional and formal, cummerbunds were designed to be worn only with tuxedos. They also make a great place to store your phone.

name: Menzies Tartan Wool Necktie
desc: Woven in Scotland, this slim (but not skinny) wool tie features the distinct Menzies tartan pattern. This piece is meticulously handcrafted with the finest fabric to give your look that extra touch of sophistication.

name: Navy Wool/Silk Necktie
desc: Sometimes having the blues is a good thing. This slim (but not skinny) tie goes with almost everything, and elevates any look to a more formal level.

name: Tangerine Silk Necktie
desc: Orange you glad we made this tangerine tie? Okay, dad jokes aside-this tie is 100% silk, a unique color, and will make you look good.

name: Navy Pindot Silk Bow Tie
desc: Nothing displays formalwear mastery like this hand-tied bow tie. Made of silk with pin dot detailing, this bow features the perfect amount of pattern.

name: Cadet Blue Butterfly Bow Tie
desc: Sometimes, having the blues is a good thing. This bow tie's subtle blue-grey shade and classic butterfly shape are the ultimate in timeless style.

name: Seafoam Linen/Silk Bow Tie
desc: This pastel linen bow tie is perfect for adding some unexpected color to your look. Ideal for spring and summer, it's great for outdoor events.

name: Suspenders
desc: Pair our streamlined suspenders with any tuxedo or suit for a timeless look. Tuxedo orders ship with button style suspenders. Suit orders ship with clip style suspenders.

name: Violet Butterfly Bow Tie
desc: Purple is the color of royalty, which makes sense because this bow tie rules. In a classic butterfly shape, this one's great for adding a pop of refined color to your look.

name: Gold Silk Diamond Bow Tie
desc: This is the gold standard of bow ties literally. Made from silk that has a slight shimmer, with a statement-making diamond shape.

name: Deep Rose Butterfly Bow Tie
desc: Stop and smell the roses (but don't stop and smell this bow tie that would be weird). This rich color is refined and universally flattering you really can't go wrong with it.

name: Black Patent Leather Shoes
desc: Time to shine. These patent leather, derby shoes are designed to up the style factor on any formal look (not to mention, turn heads on the dance floor).

name: Brown Leather Shoes
desc: Put your best foot forward. These classic derby shoes are the go-to for any formal look. Wear them with one of our suits for timeless style.

name: Black Leather Shoes
desc: Put your best foot forward. These classic derby shoes are the go-to for any formal look. Wear them with one of our tuxes for timeless style.

name: Black Leather Wood Sole
desc: You know what they say: opposites attract. Sleek black leather and natural wood soles make the perfect twist on the classic dress shoe.

name: Patent Leather Wood Sole
desc: You know what they say: opposites attract. Sleek patent leather and natural wood soles make the perfect twist on the classic dress shoe.

name: Velvet Slip-On Shoes
desc: We're really feeling these velvet slip-on shoes. Fun and festive, they're perfect for adding rich texture to your outfit.

name: Brown Suede Shoes
desc: Uptown, downtown, or out-of-town, these suede derbies lend a laid-back breeziness to any outfit - our new favorite to compliment our suits (yes, even black).

name: Black Grosgrain Loafers
desc: This loafer doesn't take time off. Wear these formalwear classics with one of our tuxedos for timeless style that won't quit.

name: Black Belt
desc: Earn your black belt in timeless style. You can't go wrong with this classic, a perfect match for our light grey and charcoal suits.

name: Gold Tie Clip
desc: This gold tie clip has looks and brains. Not only will it hold your tie in place-it also brings a just the right amount of flash to your neckwear.

name: Brown Suede Belt
desc: Pull it all together with this classic—a perfect match for our gray, charcoal or navy suits.

name: Black Linen Pocket Square
desc: This black pocket square is a classic staple for the well-dressed man. Handcrafted with the finest linen, this square adds an extra touch of sophistication to your look.

name: Black Quad Pocket Square
desc: Change your pocket square color with your mood. This silk/linen blend pocket square features four complementary colors and endless possibilities-it all depends on how you fold it.

name: Purple Quad Pocket Square
desc: Change your pocket square color with your mood. This silk/linen blend pocket square features four complementary colors and endless possibilities-it all depends on how you fold it.

name: White Linen Pocket Square
desc: This white pocket square is a classic staple for the well-dressed man. Handcrafted with the finest linen, this square will add an extra touch of sophistication to your look.

name: Leopard Print Pocket Square
desc: Spotted: you, sporting this leopard print pocket square, owning the party. Designed to steal the spotlight, you'll feel like the king of the jungle - or, you know, your special event - while wearing this one.
